CustomField.formula: NOT(AND(Business_Registration_Number__c, Directors__c, Risk_Assessment__c, Registered_Company_Name_Check__c, Trading_Name_Checkbox__c, OR(Bank_Account_Details__c, NOT(INCLUDES(Product__c, 'VANs'))), Business_Address__c, Screening__c, OR(Beneficial_Ownership__c, NOT(INCLUDES(Product__c, 'VANs')), ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Public Company'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Sole Trader'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Regulated Firm'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Government'))))
CustomField.label: DD Checkboxes Incomplete
